actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to extend to future beneficiaries the restoration of minimum benefits recently enacted for existing beneficiaries.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to restore the minimum monthly social security benefit with respect to benefits for months after December 1981.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to extend to future beneficiaries the restoration of minimum benefits recently enacted for existing beneficiaries.
